text:

creator: tkieffer@cora.fr
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
> at java.awt.Color.<clinit>(Color.java:275)

The java.awt.Color class fails to initialize due to a missing component.

Not a bug in Tomcat.

http://tomcat.apache.org/bugreport.html#Bugzilla_is_not_a_support_forum

My suggestion would be to google for "java headless", "java.awt.headless" and ask for help elsewhere (as explained in the above link).


Also, note that the current versions of Java 8 are 8u151/152. (jdk1.8.0_121 is behind by several security updates).

Sorry It's not a tomcat issue. 

Thanks for the response.
creator: tkieffer@cora.fr
